action_list.name: action_stop

action_list.name: action_delete

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum install -y --quiet python-devel openldap-devel
sudo /usr/local/bin/pip3 install django-auth-ldap

sudo sed -i "s/REMOTE_AUTH_BACKEND = 'netbox.authentication.RemoteUserBackend'/REMOTE_AUTH_BACKEND = 'netbox.authentication.LDAPBackend'/" /opt/netbox/netbox/netbox/configuration.py

cat /etc/resolv.conf | grep -v nameserver > resolv.conf
echo "nameserver @@{LDAP_SERVER_IP}@@" >> resolv.conf
grep nameserver /etc/resolv.conf >> resolv.conf
sudo mv resolv.conf /etc/resolv.conf

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

echo 'import ldap

AUTH_LDAP_SERVER_URI = "ldap://@@{LDAP_SERVER_IP}@@:389"

AUTH_LDAP_CONNECTION_OPTIONS = {
    ldap.OPT_REFERRALS: 0
}

AUTH_LDAP_BIND_DN = "@@{AUTH_LDAP_BIND_DN}@@"
AUTH_LDAP_BIND_PASSWORD = "@@{AUTH_LDAP_BIND_PASSWORD}@@"

LDAP_IGNORE_CERT_ERRORS = True

from django_auth_ldap.config import LDAPSearch

AUTH_LDAP_USER_SEARCH = LDAPSearch("@@{AUTH_LDAP_USER_SEARCH}@@",ldap.SCOPE_SUBTREE,"(sAMAccountName=%(user)s)")


AUTH_LDAP_USER_ATTR_MAP = {
    "first_name": "givenName",
    "last_name": "sn",
    "email": "mail"
}

import logging, logging.handlers
logfile = "/opt/netbox/logs/django-ldap-debug.log"
my_logger = logging.getLogger("django_auth_ldap")
my_logger.setLevel(logging.DEBUG)
handler = logging.handlers.RotatingFileHandler(
    logfile, maxBytes=1024 * 500, backupCount=5
)
my_logger.addHandler(handler)' | sudo tee -a /opt/netbox/netbox/netbox/ldap_config.py

sudo mkdir -p /opt/netbox/logs
sudo touch /opt/netbox/logs/django-ldap-debug.log
sudo chmod 777 /opt/netbox/logs/django-ldap-debug.log

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

# -*- Variables and constants.
NETBOX_URL="@@{NETBOX_URL}@@"
VERSION=$(NETBOX_URL=${NETBOX_URL%.tar.gz} && echo "${NETBOX_URL##*/v}")

# -*- Installation and configure Netbox pre-requisites.
sudo yum update --quiet -y

curl -C - -L -O --retry 6 --retry-max-time 60 --retry-delay 60 --silent --show-error $NETBOX_URL
sudo tar -zxvf v${VERSION}.tar.gz -C /opt
sudo cp /opt/netbox/gunicorn_config.py /opt/netbox-${VERSION}/gunicorn_config.py
sudo cp /opt/netbox/netbox/netbox/configuration.py  /opt/netbox-${VERSION}/netbox/netbox/configuration.py

# -*- Stop services and upgrade.
sudo systemctl stop supervisord nginx
sudo ln -sfn /opt/netbox-${VERSION} /opt/netbox

cd /opt/netbox
sudo /usr/local/bin/pip3 install -q -r requirements.txt

cd /opt/netbox/netbox/
python3 manage.py migrate
sudo python3 manage.py collectstatic --no-input

sudo systemctl start supervisord nginx

#!/bin/bash
set -ex 

sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static @@{name}@@
sudo yum update --quiet -y
#sudo sed -i s/^SELINUX=.*$/SELINUX=disabled/ /etc/selinux/config
sudo setsebool -P httpd_can_network_connect 1 #enable http connections through network

sudo yum install -y --quiet lvm2 numactl lsscsi

sudo mkdir -p /var/lib/pgsql

if [ -e /dev/sda ];		# For all providers except AWS
then
    sudo pvcreate /dev/sd{b,c,d}
    sudo vgcreate postgresdata /dev/sd{b,c,d}
elif [ -e /dev/xvda ];	#AWS disks
then
    sudo pvcreate /dev/xvd{b,c,d}
    sudo vgcreate postgresdata /dev/xvd{b,c,d}
fi
sudo lvcreate -i 3 -l 100%VG -n postgresdata_lvm postgresdata
sudo mkfs.xfs /dev/postgresdata/postgresdata_lvm
echo -e "/dev/postgresdata/postgresdata_lvm \t /var/lib/pgsql \t xfs \t defaults \t 0 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab
sudo mount -a

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum install -y https://download.postgresql.org/pub/repos/yum/reporpms/EL-7-x86_64/pgdg-redhat-repo-latest.noarch.rpm
sudo yum install -y postgresql12 postgresql12-server postgresql12-contrib
sudo /usr/pgsql-12/bin/postgresql-12-setup initdb

sudo systemctl start postgresql-12
sudo systemctl enable postgresql-12

sudo sed -i '/127.0.0.1\/32/d' /var/lib/pgsql/12/data/pg_hba.conf
sudo sed -i '/::1\/128/d' /var/lib/pgsql/12/data/pg_hba.conf
echo -e "host \t all \t all \t 127.0.0.1/32 \t md5" | sudo tee -a /var/lib/pgsql/12/data/pg_hba.conf
echo -e "host \t all \t all \t ::1/128 \t md5" | sudo tee -a /var/lib/pgsql/12/data/pg_hba.conf

sudo systemctl restart postgresql-12

Enable LDAP Auth (Optional)
        `LDAP_SERVER_IP` : AD/LDAP server IP.
        `AUTH_LDAP_BIND_DN` : The distinguished name to use when binding to the LDAP server.
        `AUTH_LDAP_BIND_PASSWORD` : The password to use with `AUTH_LDAP_BIND_DN`.
        `AUTH_LDAP_USER_SEARCH` : An LDAPSearch object that will locate a user in the directory.

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum install -y --quiet python-devel openldap-devel
sudo /usr/local/bin/pip3 install django-auth-ldap

sudo sed -i "s/REMOTE_AUTH_BACKEND = 'netbox.authentication.RemoteUserBackend'/REMOTE_AUTH_BACKEND = 'netbox.authentication.LDAPBackend'/" /opt/netbox/netbox/netbox/configuration.py

cat /etc/resolv.conf | grep -v nameserver > resolv.conf
echo "nameserver @@{LDAP_SERVER_IP}@@" >> resolv.conf
grep nameserver /etc/resolv.conf >> resolv.conf
sudo mv resolv.conf /etc/resolv.conf

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

echo 'import ldap

AUTH_LDAP_SERVER_URI = "ldap://@@{LDAP_SERVER_IP}@@:389"

AUTH_LDAP_CONNECTION_OPTIONS = {
    ldap.OPT_REFERRALS: 0
}

AUTH_LDAP_BIND_DN = "@@{AUTH_LDAP_BIND_DN}@@"
AUTH_LDAP_BIND_PASSWORD = "@@{AUTH_LDAP_BIND_PASSWORD}@@"

LDAP_IGNORE_CERT_ERRORS = True

AUTH_LDAP_USER_SEARCH = LDAPSearch("@@{AUTH_LDAP_USER_SEARCH}@@",ldap.SCOPE_SUBTREE,"(sAMAccountName=%(user)s)")


AUTH_LDAP_USER_ATTR_MAP = {
    "first_name": "givenName",
    "last_name": "sn",
    "email": "mail"
}

import logging, logging.handlers
logfile = "/opt/netbox/logs/django-ldap-debug.log"
my_logger = logging.getLogger("django_auth_ldap")
my_logger.setLevel(logging.DEBUG)

    logfile, maxBytes=1024 * 500, backupCount=5

my_logger.addHandler(handler)' | sudo tee -a /opt/netbox/netbox/netbox/ldap_config.py

sudo mkdir -p /opt/netbox/logs
sudo touch /opt/netbox/logs/django-ldap-debug.log
sudo chmod 777 /opt/netbox/logs/django-ldap-debug.log

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

# -*- Variables and constants.
NETBOX_URL="@@{NETBOX_URL}@@"
VERSION=$(NETBOX_URL=${NETBOX_URL%.tar.gz} && echo "${NETBOX_URL##*/v}")

# -*- Installation and configure Netbox pre-requisites.
sudo yum update --quiet -y

curl -C - -L -O --retry 6 --retry-max-time 60 --retry-delay 60 --silent --show-error $NETBOX_URL
sudo tar -zxvf v${VERSION}.tar.gz -C /opt
sudo cp /opt/netbox/gunicorn_config.py /opt/netbox-${VERSION}/gunicorn_config.py
sudo cp /opt/netbox/netbox/netbox/configuration.py  /opt/netbox-${VERSION}/netbox/netbox/configuration.py

# -*- Stop services and upgrade.
sudo systemctl stop supervisord nginx
sudo ln -sfn /opt/netbox-${VERSION} /opt/netbox

cd /opt/netbox
sudo /usr/local/bin/pip3 install -q -r requirements.txt

cd /opt/netbox/netbox/
python3 manage.py migrate
sudo python3 manage.py collectstatic --no-input

sudo systemctl start supervisord nginx

#!/bin/bash
set -ex 

sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static @@{name}@@
sudo yum update --quiet -y
#sudo sed -i s/^SELINUX=.*$/SELINUX=disabled/ /etc/selinux/config
sudo setsebool -P httpd_can_network_connect 1 #enable http connections through network

sudo yum install -y --quiet lvm2 numactl lsscsi

sudo mkdir -p /var/lib/pgsql

if [ -e /dev/sda ];		# For all providers except AWS
then
    sudo pvcreate /dev/sd{b,c,d}
    sudo vgcreate postgresdata /dev/sd{b,c,d}
elif [ -e /dev/xvda ];	#AWS disks
then
    sudo pvcreate /dev/xvd{b,c,d}
    sudo vgcreate postgresdata /dev/xvd{b,c,d}
fi
sudo lvcreate -i 3 -l 100%VG -n postgresdata_lvm postgresdata
sudo mkfs.xfs /dev/postgresdata/postgresdata_lvm
echo -e "/dev/postgresdata/postgresdata_lvm \t /var/lib/pgsql \t xfs \t defaults \t 0 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab
sudo mount -a

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum install -y https://download.postgresql.org/pub/repos/yum/reporpms/EL-7-x86_64/pgdg-redhat-repo-latest.noarch.rpm
sudo yum install -y postgresql12 postgresql12-server postgresql12-contrib
sudo /usr/pgsql-12/bin/postgresql-12-setup initdb

sudo systemctl start postgresql-12
sudo systemctl enable postgresql-12

sudo sed -i '/127.0.0.1\/32/d' /var/lib/pgsql/12/data/pg_hba.conf
sudo sed -i '/::1\/128/d' /var/lib/pgsql/12/data/pg_hba.conf
echo -e "host \t all \t all \t 127.0.0.1/32 \t md5" | sudo tee -a /var/lib/pgsql/12/data/pg_hba.conf
echo -e "host \t all \t all \t ::1/128 \t md5" | sudo tee -a /var/lib/pgsql/12/data/pg_hba.conf

sudo systemctl restart postgresql-12

        `AUTH_LDAP_USER_SEARCH` : An LDAPSearch object that will locate a user in the directory.
